title: An inuectyue agenst the moost wicked [and] detestable vyce of swearing, newly co[m]piled by Theodore Basille
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publisher: By J. Mayler and J. Gough,
notes: Running title reads: The inuectyue agaynst swearyng.
Identified as STC 1732 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
